articles.author: MARIA SHERMAN
articles.title: Review: Kendrick Lamar brings America and 'Not Like Us' into history-making Super Bowl halftime show - The Associated Press
articles.description: “Salutations!,” the actor Samuel L. Jackson dressed as Uncle Sam introduced Kendrick Lamar at New Orleans’ Caesars Superdome for the 2024 Super Bowl halftime show. It was a powerful, commanding creative choice by the first solo hip-hop artist to ever headline…
articles.content: Salutations!, the actor Samuel L. Jackson, dressed as Uncle Sam introduced Kendrick Lamar at New Orleans Caesars Superdome for the 2025 Super Bowl halftime show a powerful, commanding creative choice… [+3308 chars]

articles.author: Mick Krever
articles.title: Holocaust becomes political bludgeon as Netanyahu returns to a country at crossroads - CNN
articles.description: As Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu returns from a week-long trip to Washington, toting a fantastical and radical Gaza plan from the American president, he finds a country at a crossroads.
articles.content:
